com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.app

Class SmartStoreSDKManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.app.SalesforceSDKManager
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.app.SmartStoreSDKManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SmartSyncSDKManager

    public class SmartStoreSDKManager
extends SalesforceSDKManager
    SDK Manager for all native applications that use SmartStore

      • hasGlobalSmartStore

        public boolean hasGlobalSmartStore(java.lang.String dbName)
        Returns whether global smart store is enabled or not.
        Parameters:
        dbName - Database name. This must be a valid file name without a filename extension such as ".db". Pass 'null' for default.
        Returns:
        True - if the specified global database exists, False - otherwise.

      • hasSmartStore

        public boolean hasSmartStore()
        Returns whether smart store is enabled for the current user or not.
        Returns:
        True - if the user has a smart store database, False - otherwise.
